thread.title: Windows 10’s Already Taking Over the Modern Windows Ecosystem, Stats Show
thread.title_full: Windows 10’s Already Taking Over the Modern Windows Ecosystem, Stats Show

title: Windows 10’s Already Taking Over the Modern Windows Ecosystem, Stats Show
text: Windows 10’s Already Taking Over the Modern Windows Ecosystem, Stats Show Thursday, 10 September 2015 (9 minutes ago) Microsoft has launched Windows 10 on July 29 and since then, adoption figures of the new operating system improved significantly, with data provided by various research companies around the world pointing to a performance that’s even better than Windows 7’s in the first weeks on the market. AdDuplex, who has previously provided us with Windows Phone marke...
